description: Completely multiplicative with a(p(k)) = floor( (p(k+1)+1)/2 ) for k-th prime p(k).
formula: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = ((A000040(A000720(p)+1)+1)/2)^e. - _David W. Wilson_, Aug 01 2001
prog: (PARI) tcp(n) = my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i,1] = (nextprime(f[i,1]+1)+1)/2); factorback(f); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 09 2014
author: _Marc LeBrun_
extensions: Corrected and extended by _David W. Wilson_.
